br.com.concepting.framework.util.interfaces

Interface IRobotUser32API

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.sun.jna.AltCallingConvention, com.sun.jna.Library, com.sun.jna.win32.StdCall, com.sun.jna.win32.StdCallLibrary

    public interface IRobotUser32API
extends com.sun.jna.win32.StdCallLibrary
    Interface que define métodos da API do Windows (User32.dll) através do recurso JNA.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
